question: Who created the world's biggest sand Santa-face with the message "world peace" in Odisha?
explanation: Sudarsan Pattnaik, international sand artist, created the world's biggest sand Santa-face with the message "world peace" at Puri beach, Odisha. The sand Santa face is 25 feet tall and 50 feet wide. It is to be placed in the Limca Book of World Records. Sudarsan Pattnaik also created a sand sculpture of Jesus Christ in front of the Santa face. He used around 600 tonnes of sand. The work was completed in 3 days (35 hours). This structure will be on display till January 1, 2018.
